mapper.select: SELECT id, TRIM(display_name) AS display_name, rep, rating, rep_pos, rating_pos FROM players WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO players(id, display_name, rep, rating, rep_pos, rating_pos) VALUES (#{id}, #{displayName}, #{rep}, 1500, -1, -1)
mapper.update: UPDATE players SET rating_pos = players_with_actual_rating_pos.actual_rating_pos FROM players_with_actual_rating_pos WHERE players.id = players_with_actual_rating_pos.id AND players.id BETWEEN #{fromId} AND #{toId} - 1;

UPDATE players SET rep_pos = players_with_actual_rep_pos.actual_rep_pos FROM players_with_actual_rep_pos WHERE players.id = players_with_actual_rep_pos.id AND players.id BETWEEN #{fromId} AND #{toId} - 1;
